title: Ternary Spiking Neural Networks Enhanced by Complemented Neurons and Membrane Potential Aggregation
comment: Submission in progress. Code is available at https://github.com/ZBX05/Enhanced-TernarySNN
summary: Spiking Neural Networks (SNNs) are promising energy-efficient models and powerful framworks of modeling neuron dynamics. However, existing binary spiking neurons exhibit limited biological plausibilities and low information capacity. Recently developed ternary spiking neuron possesses higher consistency with biological principles (i.e. excitation-inhibition balance mechanism). Despite of this, the ternary spiking neuron suffers from defects including iterative information loss, temporal gradient vanishing and irregular distributions of membrane potentials. To address these issues, we propose Complemented Ternary Spiking Neuron (CTSN), a novel ternary spiking neuron model that incorporates an learnable complemental term to store information from historical inputs. CTSN effectively improves the deficiencies of ternary spiking neuron, while the embedded learnable factors enable CTSN to adaptively adjust neuron dynamics, providing strong neural heterogeneity. Furthermore, based on the temporal evolution features of ternary spiking neurons' membrane potential distributions, we propose the Temporal Membrane Potential Regularization (TMPR) training method. TMPR introduces time-varying regularization strategy utilizing membrane potentials, furhter enhancing the training process by creating extra backpropagation paths. We validate our methods through extensive experiments on various datasets, demonstrating remarkable performance advances.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了互补三元脉冲神经元（CTSN）模型和时序膜电位正则化（TMPR）训练方法，通过引入可学习的互补项和时变正则化策略，有效解决了现有三元脉冲神经元的信息损失、梯度消失和膜电位分布不规则等问题，显著提升了脉冲神经网络的性能。
AI.motivation: 现有二元脉冲神经元的生物合理性和信息容量有限，而新近发展的三元脉冲神经元虽然与生物兴奋-抑制平衡机制更一致，但仍存在迭代信息损失、时序梯度消失和膜电位分布不规则等缺陷，需要新的神经元模型和训练方法来解决这些问题。
AI.method: 本文提出了互补三元脉冲神经元（CTSN）模型，通过引入可学习的互补项来存储历史输入信息，有效改善三元脉冲神经元的缺陷，同时嵌入的可学习因子使CTSN能够自适应调整神经元动力学，提供强大的神经异质性。此外，基于三元脉冲神经元膜电位分布的时序演化特征，提出了时序膜电位正则化（TMPR）训练方法，利用膜电位引入时变正则化策略，通过创建额外的反向传播路径进一步增强训练过程。
AI.result: 通过在多个数据集上进行广泛实验验证，所提出的方法展示了显著的性能提升。CTSN模型有效解决了三元脉冲神经元的信息损失和梯度消失问题，同时TMPR训练方法通过时变正则化策略进一步优化了训练过程，实验结果表明该方法在脉冲神经网络中实现了卓越的性能表现。
AI.conclusion: 该研究通过CTSN模型和TMPR训练方法的结合，为脉冲神经网络提供了更生物合理且高效的解决方案。互补项的设计增强了信息存储能力，可学习因子实现了神经元动力学的自适应调整，而时变正则化策略则为脉冲神经网络的训练提供了新的优化路径，这些创新为未来更复杂脉冲神经网络架构的发展奠定了基础。
